page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: The two main housing areas are Croftlands-a modern housing estate containing a mixture of council and owner occupied detached and semi-detached houses and bungalows- and Bardsea, a small village of terraced stone cottages with some modern development. There are a few farms in the area and several flats in the grounds of Conishead Priory. In a sample taken of children living on the Croftlands Estate,12% lived in detached houses and 88% in semi-detached.The average number of rooms in the houses was 7 and the average family size was 4 people.
